Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.chat

Class Message

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.chat.Message
public class Message extends Object
Message class represent a single message sent by a user privately or globally

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Message(String sender, String content)
    Constructor for a global chat message
    Message(String sender, String recipient, String content)
    Constructor for a private message between two players

  • Constructor Details

    • Message

      public Message(String sender, String recipient, String content)
      Constructor for a private message between two players
      Parameters:
      sender - the username of the sender
      recipient - the username of the recipient
      content - the content of the message

    • Message

      public Message(String sender, String content)
      Constructor for a global chat message
      Parameters:
      sender - the username of the sender
      content - the username of the recipient

  • Method Details

    • getContent

      public String getContent()
      The method used to retrieve the content of the message
      Returns:
      the content of the message

    • getSender

      public String getSender()
      The method used to retrieve the sender of the message
      Returns:
      the username of the sender of the message

    • getRecipient

      public Optional<String> getRecipient()
      The method used to retrieve the recipient of the message, if present
      Returns:
      an Optional String containing the username of the recipient if the message is a private message, an empty optional otherwise
